attributes.action: The travesty of lack of parking at Harper Adams University
attributes.background: The parking situation has become a complete joke at Harper Adams and the universities decision to fine students is ridiculous when they do not provide enough parking for us. The university knows students needs cars, so why there is not enough parking is astonishing.

rejection.details: This isn't the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. We'd suggest you raise this issue directly with the university.
